defaultSnippets.label: SetSchemaMetadata - Set schema name
defaultSnippets.description: Set the schema name for records. Replace 'com.example.MyRecord' with your actual schema name (typically a fully qualified class name).
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**SetSchemaMetadata** - Set the schema name for records.

Replace `com.example.MyRecord` with your actual schema name (typically a fully qualified class name).

**Use case:** Standardize schema names across connectors or set schema names when they're missing. Required for Schema Registry integration.

defaultSnippets.label: SetSchemaMetadata - Set schema name and version
defaultSnippets.description: Set both schema name and version. Useful for schema evolution tracking. Replace schema name and version number as needed.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**SetSchemaMetadata** - Set both schema name and version.

Useful for schema evolution tracking. Replace schema name and version number as needed.

**Use case:** Track schema versions for evolution management. Higher versions indicate newer schema formats. Essential when using Schema Registry with versioning.
